I have thoroughly reviewed the new project proposal, and I must say that I am completely opposed to it. The idea of taking on this project is a disaster waiting to happen. Sincerely,

Sometimes I wonder if everyone else has their act together except me. Like, why does Sarah seem to have this effortless career trajectory while I'm still struggling to find a job that pays more than minimum wage? It's not fair, right? She must be getting some secret advantage or something.

But at the same time, I know I'm not alone in feeling this way. There are plenty of other people out there who are probably just as lost as I am. Maybe we can start a support group for people who are secretly miserable with their lives. That sounds like a great idea...
